tableResults.value: n=180†The denominator provided is the number of patients who had maximum allowable dose data available; the level of RAS blockade could be missing due to maximum allowable dose being unavailable. For patients taking both ACE inhibitor and ARB, the sum of the percentage of maximum allowable dose for each was summarised.
